name: Super Pusher：Lucky Winner
description:
Join in the fun and play Super Pusher：Lucky Winner. Enjoy an awesomely crafted, real scale, coin pusher machine experience! you just need to click the screen, drop the coins to receive different rewards. Now start to win coins, tokens, fruits and many gifts!
Game Feature:
- Click and drop coins on the table, collect the coins by pushing them off the table.
- Push coins go into the slots box to play the slot machine!
- Use “Shake” to make coins dropping faster.
- Use “Wall” to keep more coins on the table.
- All the dimes are freely available for you.
- Keep shooting and pushing the coins, just tap anywhere to start pusher.
- Collect prizes and puzzles to get special rewards and additional rewards from coin pushers.
- Spin to win the mega jackpot when slot machine coin collected. Hit lucky 777, and win your rewards!
Super Pusher brings you the best carnival fun! Download and play the most exciting coin pusher game now! To earn unlimited coins and special rewards in Super Pusher.
